Joanne is not only highly skilled but also incredibly attentive to her clients‚Äô needs. She took the time to carefully listen to what my wife wanted and provided excellent advice on a hairstyle that would suit her face shape and lifestyle perfectly.

Stylist Joanne and assistant Yvonne were very accommodating and open to how i wanted my hair. Been getting my hair cut here for years and service has been great!

I had an amazing experience with the entire team! Hairstylist Joanne was incredibly skilled and truly listened to what I wanted, delivering a perfect cut and style that exceeded my expectations. The receptionist Patrina was warm, welcoming, and organized, ensuring the process was smooth from start to finish. The entire Kovan team worked seamlessly together, creating a friendly and professional atmosphere. I left feeling pampered and absolutely loving my new look. Highly recommend this talented group!

Good service and like my new hair cut.
My favourite hair stylist Joanne and attentive assistant Yvonne  who wash and massage my tired neck.
Will come back again.
Frequent customer of kovan branch. My favourite hairstylist, Kelly did a great job maintaining my hair for me. All staff are friendly and approachable. Will continue to support them.
